021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
023import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
024
025import java.math.BigDecimal;
026import java.util.HashMap;
027import java.util.Map;
028import java.util.UUID;
029
030/**
031 * Represents data for a message translation to be sent to a sender.
032 *
033 * @author creatorfromhell
034 * @since 0.1.2.0
035 */
036public class MessageData {
037
038  private final Map<String, String> replacements = new HashMap<>();
039
040  private final String node;
041
042  public MessageData(String node) {
043
044    this.node = node;
045  }
046
047  public void addReplacement(final String search, final String replacement) {
048
049    this.replacements.put(search, replacement);
050  }
051
052  public void addReplacement(final String search, final BigDecimal replacement) {
053
054    this.replacements.put(search, replacement.toPlainString());
055  }
056
057  public void addReplacement(final String search, final Integer replacement) {
058
059    this.replacements.put(search, String.valueOf(replacement));
060  }
061
062  public void addReplacement(final String search, final Double replacement) {
063
064    this.replacements.put(search, String.valueOf(replacement));
065  }
066
067  public void addReplacement(final String search, final Boolean replacement) {
068
069    this.replacements.put(search, String.valueOf(replacement));
070  }
071
072  public void addReplacement(final String search, final UUID replacement) {
073
074    this.replacements.put(search, replacement.toString());
075  }
076
077  public void addReplacements(final String[] search, final String[] replacements) {
078
079    if(search.length != replacements.length) return;
080
081    for(int i = 0; i < search.length; i++) {
082
083      this.replacements.put(search[i], replacements[i]);
084    }
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * Used to translate a message for a player and return the translated {@link Component}.
089   *
090   * @param player The {@link PlayerProvider player} to translate this for.
091   *
092   * @return The {@link Component} that is the result of the translation process of the message for
093   * the given player.
094   */
095  public Component grab(@NotNull PlayerProvider player) {
096
097    return MessageHandler.grab(this, player);
098  }
099
100
101  /**
102   * Used to translate a message for a player and return the translated {@link Component}.
103   *
104   * @param id The {@link UUID unique identifier} of the player to translate this for.
105   *
106   * @return The {@link Component} that is the result of the translation process of the message for
107   * the given player.
108   */
109  public Component grab(@NotNull UUID id) {
110
111    return MessageHandler.grab(this, id);
112  }
113
114  public Map<String, String> getReplacements() {
115
116    return replacements;
117  }
118
119  public String getNode() {
120
121    return node;
122  }
123}
